metadata.title: CVE-2022-42003 on Ubuntu 22.04 LTS (jammy) - medium
metadata.description: In FasterXML jackson-databind before versions 2.13.4.1 and 2.12.17.1,resource exhaustion can occur because of a lack of a check in primitivevalue deserializers to avoid deep wrapper array nesting, when theUNWRAP_SINGLE_VALUE_ARRAYS feature is enabled.

criterions.comment: jackson-databind package in jammy is affected and needs fixing.
